pr_title: Added new ValidatorOptions validation rule and improved readability of existing error + tests.

timeline.message: Added new ValidatorOptions validation rule and improved readability of existing error + tests.

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
"Invalid configuration. '--validators-key-files' and '--validators-key-password-files' cannot be specified separately";
"Invalid configuration. '--validators-key-files' and '--validators-key-password-files' must be specified together";
timeline.author: macfarla

timeline.body: number of arguments doesn't seem quite right. The argument is a list, containing a number of items? Size or length might be more accurate
timeline.bodyText: number of arguments doesn't seem quite right. The argument is a list, containing a number of items? Size or length might be more accurate
timeline.bodyHTML: number of arguments doesn't seem quite right. The argument is a list, containing a number of items? Size or length might be more accurate
timeline.author: macfarla

replies.bodyText:
We're trying to make it more human-readable, imo referring to the number of items in a list as size or length is confusing.
Perhaps something more like:
"The number of files specified for --validators-key-files [%d] and --validators-key-password-files [%d] must match" ?
replies.author: mark-terry

replies.bodyText: each key file specified by --validators-keys-files must also have a password file specified by --validators-key-password-files?
replies.author: rolfyone

replies.bodyText: you must specify the same number of key and password files?
replies.author: macfarla

replies.bodyText: The number of --validators-key-files (num) must equal the number of --validators-key-password-files (num)
replies.author: mark-terry
